column4: i am using gaim in feisty fawn, but i want it to upgrape to pidgin. i have downloaded .deb package but it says that the packge is already installed but actually it is not so. what should i do
the instructions where you got the package said to be sure to remove the old package first.
Did you get it from getdeb?
Did you get it from getdeb?  If so it says right there to remove the other package first
